contentrichtext.text: {{no footnotes|date=January 2013}} '''Ants Eskola''' (until 1935 '''Gerhardt Esperk'''; 17 February 1908 in [[Tallinn]] â€“ 14 December 1989 in Tallinn) was an [[Estonia]]n actor and singer. He appeared in 25 films from 1930 to 1979. ==External links== *{{imdb name|id=0260663|name=Ants Eskola}} * [http://www.estmusic.com/index.php?011337212298 Estmusic.com] On this website it's possible to listen to various Estonian singers from 1930s, including Ants Eskola. {{Authority control|VIAF=55698022}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Eskola, Ants | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = EStonian actor and singer | DATE OF BIRTH = 17 February 1908 | PLACE OF BIRTH = Tallinn, Estonia | DATE OF DEATH = 14 December 1989 | PLACE OF DEATH = Tallinn, Estonia }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Eskola, Ants}} [[Category:1908 births]] [[Category:1989 deaths]] [[Category:Estonian film actors]] [[Category:Estonian male singers]] [[Category:Soviet actors]] [[Category:People from Tallinn]] {{estonia-actor-stub}}
